languages.text: "Я подозревал{mf||а}, откуда у тебя столько сил. Ты поклоняешься не тому богу".

traits.locale_text: "Я подозревал{mf||а}, откуда у тебя столько сил. Ты поклоняешься не тому богу".

languages.text: "For a while now, I have had my suspicions about the source of your remarkable strength. You have turned to the Ruinous Powers."
languages.original_text: "Я подозревал{mf||а}, откуда у тебя столько сил. Ты поклоняешься не тому богу".

traits.locale_text: "I suspected tho source of your powers. You revere the wrong god."
"I suspected tho source of your powers. You revere the wrong god."
"I suspected the source of your powers. You revere the wrong god."
"I suspected the source of your powers. You revere the wrong god."
"For a while now, I have had my suspicions about the source of your remarkable strength. You have turned to the Ruinous Powers."
"For a while now, I have had my suspicions about the source of your remarkable strength. You have turned to the Ruinous Powers."

languages.text: «Llevo sospechando del origen de su formidable fuerza un tiempo. Ha recurrido a los Poderes Ruinosos».
languages.original_text: "For a while now, I have had my suspicions about the source of your remarkable strength. You have turned to the Ruinous Powers."

traits.locale_text: «Ya sospechaba del origen de sus poderes. Rinde culto al dios equivocado».

languages.text: “这么长时间以来，我一直在怀疑你那超乎常人的力量是从哪来的。原来你投靠了毁灭之力。”
languages.original_text: "For a while now, I have had my suspicions about the source of your remarkable strength. You have turned to the Ruinous Powers."

traits.locale_text: “我很怀疑你的力量来源于谁，你敬错神了。”

languages.text: « Je me doutais de la source de votre force hors du commun. Vous vous êtes tourné vers les Puissances de la Ruine. »
languages.original_text: "For a while now, I have had my suspicions about the source of your remarkable strength. You have turned to the Ruinous Powers."

traits.locale_text: « Je me doutais de la source de votre force hors du commun. Vous vous êtes tourné vers les Puissances de la Ruine. »

languages.text: 「しばらく前から、私はお前の驚異的な力の源について疑念を抱いていた。お前は禍つ神々の力に手を染めたのだな」
languages.original_text: "For a while now, I have had my suspicions about the source of your remarkable strength. You have turned to the Ruinous Powers."

traits.locale_text: 「しばらく前から、私はお前の驚異的な力の源について疑念を抱いていた。お前は禍つ神々の力に手を染めたのだな」

languages.text: "Ich hatte schon seit geraumer Zeit einen Verdacht hinsichtlich Eurer bemerkenswerten Stärke. Ihr habt Euch den Mächten der Zerstörung hingegeben."
languages.original_text: "For a while now, I have had my suspicions about the source of your remarkable strength. You have turned to the Ruinous Powers."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe schon vermutet, aus welcher Quelle Eure Kräfte stammen. Ihr verehrt den falschen Gott."

languages.text: "Uzunca bir süredir o olağanüstü gücünün kaynağı hakkında kuşkularım vardı. Meğer Yıkıcı Güçler'e sığınmışsın."
languages.original_text: "For a while now, I have had my suspicions about the source of your remarkable strength. You have turned to the Ruinous Powers."
